scripts.dev: npm --prefix filmclubapp install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix filmclubapp run dev
scripts.build: npm --prefix filmclubapp install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix filmclubapp run build
scripts.dev:thefilmclub: npm --prefix TheFilmClub install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix TheFilmClub run dev
scripts.build:thefilmclub: npm --prefix TheFilmClub install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix TheFilmClub run build
